title: Limited board posting options?
body: I am limited to only posting in help and support /mechs vs minions. Hoping this posting will update my board level and unlock the rest of the boards ðŸ¤”

replies.body: Your profile is showing up at level 26, so I'm guessing everything is okay now!  Sometimes accounts need to sync with the boards, so all looks well. Let me know if you have any issues posting!
